Module nl.meron.yaeger

Package nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Anchorable  
    Bounded
    Implementing this interface exposes the Bounded.getNonTransformedBounds() method, which returns the bounds, aka Bounding Box, of this Entity.
    ContinuousRotatable  
    Entity
    An Entity will serve as the Root Interface for all objects that are part of a YaegerScene.
    NodeProvider
    Being a NodeProvider guarantees that a Node, if set, is accessible.
    Placeable
    A Placeable has a methods that can be used to place it at a different x,y-coordinates on the YaegerScene.
    Removeable
    A Removeable denotes an Object, most likely an Entity, that is eligible for removance from its parent.
    Rotatable
    Implementing the interface Rotatable will result in de availability of the Rotatable.setRotate(double) method.
    SceneBorderCrossingWatcher
    Implement this interface to be notified if the Entity crosses the boundary of the YaegerScene.
    SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
    Implement this interface to be notified if the Entity touches the boundary of the YaegerScene.
    SceneChild
    A SceneChild is part of a YaegerScene and has thus access to width and height of the YaegerScene it is part of.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JavaFXEntity
    A JavaFXEntity can be used to display anything that is a child of a Node.
    Location
    A Location is a 2D geometric point that represents a pair of coordinates.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AnchorPoint
    An AnchorPoint denotes the point of an Entity which is being used for placement on the x,y-coordinate.
